Title: Cowboy Bebop: The Movie
Writer: Marc Handler, Keiko Nobumoto (screenplay), Hajime Yatate (based on the story by)
Actors: Kôichi Yamadera, Unshô Ishizuka, Megumi Hayashibara, Aoi Tada
Director: Shinichirô Watanabe, Tensai Okamura, Hiroyuki Okiura, Yoshiyuki Takei(co-director)
Plot: A terrorist explosion releases a deadly virus on the masses, and it's up the bounty-hunting Bebop crew to catch the cold-blooded culprit.
